Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Southport
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Southport due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Southport due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
